content: first single_crochet with a sl st 6 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 3-8 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet leave long length for sewing snout round 1 with black chain 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet in next chain 3 single_crochet in last chain working on backside of chain single_crochet in next free loop 2 single_crochet in next free loop join to first single_crochet with a slip_stitch 8 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 single_crochet round 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 16 single_crochet round 4 *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 20 single_crochet round 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 20 single_crochet round 6 *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 25 single_crochet round 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 25 single_crochet leave long length for sewing dress skirt row 1 with country rose chain 49 single_crochet in second chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 turn 48 single_crochet row 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn 96 single_crochet row 3 single_crochet in first single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet *single_crochet in next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * across chain 1 turn 96 sts row 4-18 repeat row 3 change to white at end of row 18 row 19 repeat row 3 bib row 1 with country rose yarn and working in free loops of foundation row join yarn in 15th free loop with a slip_stitch chain 3 double_crochet in next 19 loops chain 3 turn 20 double_crochet row 2-6 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn 20 double_crochet row 7 first shoulder strap double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet chain 3 turn 3 double_crochet row 8-15 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn 3 double_crochet row 16 double_crochet in each double_crochet across finish off leaving an 18 length for sewing second shoulder strap row 1 with country rose yarn join with a slip_stitch in the 3rd double_crochet from end of bib chain 3 double_crochet in next 2 double_crochet chain 3 turn 3 double_crochet row 2-9 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn 3 double_crochet row 10 double_crochet in each double_crochet across finish off leaving an 18 length for sewing dress finishing using tapestry needle and country rose sew back seam closed sew shoulder straps to top of back of skirt do not criss-cross warning choking hazard due to small parts if you are making this item for a child under the age of 3 years please embroider facial features and eliminate the glasses every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
